item.title: Video is Transforming Contact Centers
item.description: Photo Source: Shutterstock licensed to Interactive Powers Ivan Sixto Founder, CEO, Business Development Follow me on Linkedin Companies must understand that the processes of digital transformation driven by society are inevitable. In the last years, the improvement of customer support services accelerates the pace of adaptation to digital processes. The reason is the good results obtained by companies that have already integrated advanced digital tools, based, for instance, on WebRTC technology for real-time communication via the web or mobile applications.

item.title: Businesses need to Face Digital Challenges
item.description: Photo Source: Shutterstock licensed to Interactive Powers Ivan Sixto Founder, CEO, Business Development Follow me on Linkedin The spread of new communication behaviour among users is pushing companies to modify their contact channels with customers. At Interactive Powers we observe that adapting to an increasingly digitized market poses new challenges. However, it also opens one door of opportunity for companies to improve and differentiate themselves. From our offices in Spain and the United States, we provide solutions that facilitate secure and real-time multimedia interactions over the Internet.

item.title: Digital Revolution in the Contact Center
item.description: Photo Source: Shutterstock licensed to Interactive Powers Ivan Sixto Founder, CEO, Business Development Follow me on Linkedin All of us, as consumers, are becoming increasingly familiar with the use of new channels. We must also take into account that the first generation of digital natives is entering into the market. However, phone continues to be the most widely used channel in customer service and voice over IP technology. This situation is specially extended in the Spanish business landscape.
